snippet: The Netherlands intends to press a case against Russia in an international tribunal for seizing a Greenpeace International ship which was sailing under a Dutch flag.
abstract: Dutch Foreign Min Frans Timmermans says the Netherlands intends to press case against Russia in the International Tribunal for the Law of the Sea for seizing Greenpeace International ship, which was sailing in Arctic under a Dutch flag; Russian prosecutors have filed piracy charges against ship's crew.
lead_paragraph: The Netherlands intends to press a case against Russia in an international tribunal for seizing a Greenpeace International ship which was sailing under a Dutch flag.

headline.main: The Netherlands: Greenpeace Activists Gain an Ally
headline.print_headline: The Netherlands: Greenpeace Activists Gain an Ally
